messages.content: What is the purpose of the node's changelog section?
The changelog section lists updates and contributions to the node.
Why can't the ComfyUI server overwrite files?
The server does not support overwriting files as a security measure. New images are created in the temporary folder, which is cleared when ComfyUI is restarted.
How does the node handle image use?
The node uses the PoseNode and TranslateCLIPTextEncodeNode to process images and translate Russian text to English.
Where can I download the workflow.json file for PoseNode?
The workflow.json file is available at the provided link: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlekPet/ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet/master/PoseNode/workflow.json.
Is there an example of PoseNode in action?
The provided image shows an example of PoseNode connecting to ControlNet.
